Sentencas: Apatite-type lanthanum silicates (ATLS) are attracting great interest as a new class of solid electrolytes possessing high oxide-ion conductivity at relatively low temperatures for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU

Sentencas: In this study, doped ATLS of the composition La(9.83)Si(6-x-y)Al(x)FeyO(26 perpendicular to delta) (x: 0, 0.25, 0.75, 1.5 and/or y: 0, 0.25, 0.75, 1.5) were successfully prepared by solid state chemistry.
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU

Sentencas: They were brought into direct contact with CROFER-22 interconnector alloy in order to study Cr migration into the electrolyte.
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU

Sentencas: Due to inconclusive SEM-EDX results, a depth profile was acquired by Laser Induced Breakdown Spectroscopy (LIBS) and the results showed that the increase of Fe concentration in the apatite oxide's composition enhanced Cr uptake.
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU

Sentencas: At the same time, lower conductivity values were measured for the materials after Cr contamination i.e. in Fe containing ATLS.
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU

Sentencas: No significant change in conductivity was found for Fe-free ATLS sample.
Titulo: Compositional effect of Cr contamination susceptibility of La9.83Si6-x-yAlxFeyO26±δ apatite-type SOFC electrolytes in contact with CROFER 22 APU
